attributes.additional_details:
The Government must give NAYPIC a pound for every child in the country right now due to public demand then we could start to provide protection rights for every child in the country as an emergency..

as every single child needs rights just in case they end up in care..

through death of parents..

family breakdown..

or other..

basically rights need to be for ALL children even though all children hopefully will never need them..

We aim to work towards a Youth Parliament with it's own economy. Why?

We aim to become self-funding through sound business like most economies- we are not a charity

The Government at this time should be the ones to invest at least just once and that once is now by giving us our pound.. per head.. per child..

www.youthparliament.co.uk
New NAYPIC/Youth Parliament
